title: xiaoxiaoi
author: xiaoxiaoi
content: As long as you find the link I support payment and send it to me, I will pay 300,000 US dollars per day. 50% return   .@xiaoli1992

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: xiaoxiaoi on September 07, 2023, 08:14:59 PMAs long as you find the link I support payment and send it to me, I will pay 300,000 US dollars per day. 50% return   .@xiaoli1992I do not think anyone will trust you for such a payment. And 50% per day don't you think it seems nothing but like a dream in the air?? If you can really afford the payment like 50% per day then you should convince your local people, especially your family members, neighbours, and friends.
